Dank Neon for Sublime Text

A danker, more neon theme for Sublime Text.

Install

Install using Package Control

If you are using Package Control, you can easily install Dank Neon via the Package Control: Install Package menu item. The Dank Neon package is listed as Dank Neon in the packages list.
